1.name: Fishing
1.description: Reflects your skill at Fishing. Seafood is an important food resource.

3.name: Logging
3.description: Reflects your skill at harvesting wood from trees.

5.name: Mining
5.description: Mining allows you to harvest metals or minerals, which are useful for crafting metallic items.

6.name: Foraging
6.description: A reflection of your ability to gather or harvest useful items from the wilderness. These may be useful for crafting or collections.

8.name: Dodging
8.description: Dodging gives you a chance to avoid melee attacks completely. It is most effective when wearing light or no armor.

9.name: Parrying
9.description: Parrying is the art of using your own weapons to deflect the attacks of others. Most effective with and against smaller weapons such as swords.

10.name: Firearms Crafting
10.description: Reflects your skill at manufacturing firearms.

11.name: Robotics
11.description: Robotics is used to create, repair or sabotage robotic pets.

12.name: Repairing
12.description: Allows you to repair damaged items or structures.

13.name: Tailoring
13.description: This skill allows you to manufacture clothing.

14.name: Hacking
14.description: Allows you to hack electronic devices such as security systems, and to create items which will make hacking easier.

15.name: Tracking
15.description: Allows you to follow the trail of living beings.

16.name: Dual Wielding
16.description: Reflects your ability to a weapon in each hand.

17.name: Vehicle Engineering
17.description: The ability to manufacture vehicles, parts and upgrades.

18.name: Artillery
18.description: Artillerists can manufacture powerful siege weapons and turrets.

19.name: Armor Crafting
19.description: Allows the creation of armor enhancing Fittings.

20.name: Pharmaceuticals
20.description: The manufacture of pharmaceutical stims and equipment.

21.name: Culinary Arts
21.description: Reflects your ability to manufacture high quality food or drink.

22.name: Carpentry
22.description: The manufacture of wood products such as furniture or pylons.

23.name: Genetic Engineering
23.description: The collection of DNA and the engineering of hybrid life forms.

24.name: Cybernetics
24.description: Allows you to manufacture performance enhancing implants.

26.name: Horticulture
26.description: Reflects your horticulture skill, allowing you to manufacture plants and farm products.

27.name: Installations
27.description: The construction, reparation and alteration of installations or structures.

28.name: Melee Weapons Crafting
28.description: The manufacture of melee weapons such as swords or axes.

31.name: Disguise
31.description: Allows you to temporarily disguise your appearance.

32.name: Chemistry
32.description: Chemists excel at the creation of sinister items such as poisons and toxic compounds, as well as other useful crafting components.

33.name: Stealth
33.description: The ability to sneak into areas undetected. Stealth can offer an element of surprise or aid in escaping danger.

34.name: Thievery
34.description: Although frowned upon by the general public, thieves can be useful at accomplishing certain goals.

35.name: Survival
35.description: A reflection of your survival instincts and outdoor prowess.

37.name: Trap Knowledge
37.description: Allows you to manufacture, detect or disarm Traps.

39.name: First Aid
39.description: A reflection of your medical skills. First Aid allows you to treat wounds, disease and other maladies.

40.name: Veterinary Medicine
40.description: The ability to care for animals, doctoring their wounds and illnesses.

41.name: Defensive Tactics
41.description: A reflection of your leadership and defensive tactics. A good tactician can improve the performance of their entire squad.

42.name: Diplomacy
42.description: While some prefer brute strength, a skilled diplomat can often obtain the same results with no bloodshed or hard feelings.

43.name: Intimidation
43.description: Sometimes the risk of bodily harm is enough.

44.name: Leadership
44.description: A good leader can make a world of difference by improving the performance of their squad.

45.name: Protection
45.description: The protection of others, even if it means risking yourself.

49.name: Vehicle Control
49.description: A reflection of your ability to control vehicles of all types.

51.name: Assassination
51.description: Skilled assassins utilize stealth to sneak up on their targets and make short work of them.

52.name: Axe Fighting
52.description: Axes offer less in the way of protection than a sword, but are powerful, if somewhat wild, offensive weapons.

53.name: Axe Defense
53.description: A reflection of your ability to defend against Axe attacks.

54.name: Concentration
54.description: The ability to focus and concentrate in the heat of battle or outside of it.

58.name: Combat Knowledge
58.description: While most combat skills focus on a specific type of weapon, Combat Knowledge is a reflection of your general skill at combat.

59.name: Counter-Attack
59.description: Allows you to counter-attack when facing melee attacks.

60.name: Defensive Knowledge
60.description: A reflection of your general combat defense, not tied into any specific weapon type.

62.name: Dirty Fighting
62.description: Sometimes a good eye poke is all you need to get the upper hand.  Dirty tactics maybe frowned upon, but it is effective.

63.name: Thrown Weapon Defense
63.description: Your accuracy and ability with thrown weapons such as Grenades.

67.name: Aerosol Tactics
67.description: Aerosol weapons, such as flame throwers, can be useful for crowd control and wide area attacks from short range.

68.name: Aerosol Defense
68.description: Your ability to defend against Aerosol attacks.

73.name: Rifle Tactics
73.description: Rifles offer high accuracy from long range, and are a favorite of snipers.

74.name: Rifle Defense
74.description: Your ability to defend against Rifle attacks.

77.name: Shockgun Tactics
77.description: Shockguns are slow firing, but heavy hitting weapons that can damage a moderate radius.

78.name: Shockgun Defense
78.description: Your ability to defend against shockgun blasts.

79.name: Automatic Weaponry Tactics
79.description: Automatic weapons offer the highest possible rate of fire, and some Area of Effect capabilities, but suffer from inaccuracy.

80.name: Automatic Weaponry Defense
80.description: Your ability to defend against Automatic Weapons.

83.name: Unarmed Tactics
83.description: A reflection of your unarmed combat, or martial arts techniques.

86.name: Handgun Tactics
86.description: Handguns are useful against light armor, providing reasonably long range and a fast rate of fire.

87.name: Handgun Defense
87.description: Your ability to defend against pistol attacks.

92.name: Shield Tactics
92.description: A reflection of your skill with shields, on both defense and offense.

94.name: Light Armor Tactics
94.description: Light armor provides a small amount of protection from all types of weapons, but replenishes energy rapidly.

95.name: Medium Armor Tactics
95.description: Medium armor provides solid defense against most weapons, whil replenishing energy more quickly than heavier armors.

96.name: Energy Tank Tactics
96.description: Energy Tanks are used to supply energy to laser weapons and to power protective shields.

97.name: Heavy Armor Tactics
97.description: Heavy armor provides excellent protection against fast firing weapons and solid protection against most other types, but replenishes energy slowly.

99.name: Siege Tactics
99.description: Siege weapons can be used to destroy buildings or vehicles, but are too slow to be useful in most other combat situations.

102.name: Thrown Weapon Tactics
102.description: The ability to use thrown weapons, such as grenades, in an optimal manner.

103.name: Acrobatics
103.description: A reflection of your acrobatic prowess and athleticism.

104.name: Animal Handling
104.description: Allows you to tame and control animal pets.

109.name: Swimming
109.description: Skilled swimmers can move quickly, and hold their breaths longer while underwater.

110.name: Bladed Weapon Tactics
110.description: Your effectiveness with standard bladed weapons, such as Swords or Knives.

111.name: Bladed Weapon Defense
111.description: Your defensive experience vs. Bladed Weapons.

112.name: Blunt Weapon Tactics
112.description: Your experience and skill with Blunt Weapons such as Maces or Mauls.

113.name: Blunt Weapon Defense
113.description: Your experience defending against Blunt Weapons.

117.name: Entertainment
117.description: Reflects your ability to entertain others, be it through music, acting, dancing, or other types of performances.

118.name: Metalworking
118.description: Metalworking is to create components for many other trade skills.
